description.p: Yummy, eat your favourite family member!

step.p: Pat dry the skin of the guinea pig and rub in the cumin, salt, and pepper.
Dust the carcass with the flour and place it on its back in the oil, turning to cook both sides. Alternately, the guinea pig can be cut and fried in quarters.
Serve with boiled potato or boiled manioc root, and a salad of cut tomatoes and slivered onions bathed in lime juice and a bit of salt.
